Module overrungl.opengl
Package overrungl.opengl.ext.apple

Class GLAPPLEVertexArrayObject

java.lang.Object
overrungl.opengl.ext.apple.GLAPPLEVertexArrayObject
public final class GLAPPLEVertexArrayObject extends Object
GLAPPLEVertexArrayObject relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • GLAPPLEVertexArrayObject refers to one or more preview APIs: MemorySegment, SegmentAllocator.
Programs can only use GLAPPLEVertexArrayObject when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
GL_APPLE_vertex_array_object
Since:
0.1.0
Author:
squid233
